Articles.Content: Go to Moho, land, tank off, and land on every planet in order from innermost to outermost, then fly back to moho and go back to kerbin and land on top of the tower.
I'm pretty sure the rocket that has to land on Moho (the first time) will be so big it will reach out of the planet's atmosphere
This isn't really possible. You'd need a massive rocket, which would 1. crash your computer and 2. bend and break.
There should be a rule that one must not post a challenge unless they've done it themselves.

Didn't say anythign about Mods.

Edit: Or SHIFT + CTRL + ALT + D

Edited September 22, 2012 by Nooblet68

I'm pretty sure the rocket that has to land on Moho (the first time) will be so big it will reach out of the planet's atmosphere

Not really... If you use a fuel transfer mod and set up refueling stations on all the destinations prior to the main launch, I think one could do it.

There should be a rule that one must not post a challenge unless they've done it themselves.

I believe there is. Or not... Oh well, at the least it is a major 'faux pas' in this community.
